E-Mail Messages
Date: Monday, 8/11/1974
Subject: Progress of Bob Knepper
Dear Sir,
Bob Knepper has an ERA of 2.78 at A Fort Lauderdale Yankees!
I believe he is ready for the next level!

Regards,
Scouting Director



Date: Tuesday, 8/12/1974
Subject: Roe Skidmore healing process
Roe Skidmore is not recovering as fast as I have
hoped! So expect his injury to last about 7 more days.

Regards,
Team Doctor
